msg: Pull up getter/setter for acceptorThreadPriority from NIO/NIO2 and expose it for all three end points. Also expose acceptorThreadCount.

author: markt
msg: Align longPool in APR with NIO.
It does mean Processors allocated to requests when the connector is shut down could end up being eligible for GC rather than being recycled but there should be no functional change.
